page.title: 03BLURTON, TRENTHAM, BARLASTON
page.content: On the way we saw a swan and a water vole, and we also met a person in a barge. The houses next to the canal at Newpark were built in 1980 and so we talked to a friendly person about them. Next we joined Trentham Road and found that the Esso Garage had been there for 10 years, but in the past 12 months had become a self-service garage. Then we crossed the road and continued our walk along Trentham Road. We arrived at some big semi-detached houses and talked to the people living there. They told us that their houses were 90 to 100 years old, but they had only lived there for 1.5 years. Next door to them at 236 Trentham Road there were stables at the back of the house, but they are now used as garages
